item.title: netflix-eureka-on-aws-fargate
item.description: Configuration for deploying Netflix Eureka in AWS Fargate What is Netflix Eureka? Service Discovery service from Netflix. Why this article? Service Discovery can be achieved with ECS Service Discovery feature. However I have asked to work on resolve the issues while deploying Eureka into AWS Fargate. I ran into multiple challenges, sharing the knowledge what I gained here. Architecture Steps Create 3 different spring profiles to run in 3 different Availability Zones Specify other Availability Zone details in the eureka.
